## Bladeburner.nextCycle() method

Sleep until the start of the next bladeburner cycle.

**Signature:**

```typescript
nextCycle(): Promise<number>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

{<!-- -->Promise<number>} Resolves to the number of seconds being processed in this bladeburner cycle, which can vary due to accumulated "bonus time".

## Remarks

RAM cost: 1 GB
